website_summaries.verdict: You don't need to lead an active lifestyle to be able to appreciate the comfort and reliability of these tampons. Offers excellent performance that won't slow you down for a price that's more affordable than many.
pros: Uniquely designed with three layers of absorbent protection
Layers uniformly expand to fit the shape of your body, effectively reducing leaks
Pliable FlexFit interlocking fibers move with you for superior comfort
Remain dependable even during increased physical activity
Ergonomic applicator features a streamlined tip and non-slip grip
Smaller string provides maximum levels of discretion for activities like swimming
cons: Some find the shorter string a little more difficult to grip

customer_reviews.title: Half the box can’t be used
customer_reviews.text: Every single regular tampon was outside of the plastic applicator upon opening
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Heimberger

customer_reviews.title: The only tampon you should buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have converted MANY -pad- friends (*shudder*) that were scared of tampons, because of these!!! The GAME CHANGER of these, is that they have this little edge on the applicator (insertor?) that helps you grip it WAY BETTER than any other tampon on the market. Which is critical to getting it -up-in-there- enough to not feel it!!! You’ll never buy another tampon again. Might as well sign up for the subscription, because you’ll never go back!!!
customer_reviews.author: nicolehula

customer_reviews.title: Pushed out and unusable
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed... I buy these tampons all the time and they are usually great however this last box was awful! About 90% of the tampons where pushed out and unusable! Not sure if I'm gonna gamble and get these again... Not worth the money to receive another defect box.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than others
customer_reviews.text: My daughter finds these extra comfortable especially during the long hours at school sitting. She has tried the non sports playtex and finds these work better.
customer_reviews.author: Salubrious

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for my intimate needs!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Playtex brand for years. These work well as they are compact, absorbent, and have very little leak factor I have found if you have the correct absorbency in for the flow. My job is very physically demanding and I work 10-12 hour days. I need a product that can work for me. I can go a solid 7-8 hours in this product with no issues before needing to refresh!
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: Tampons were pushed outside of applicator
customer_reviews.text: I thought something was odd when after opening a few of these, the actual tampon is pushed outside the applicator. The box didn't seem tampered with and each tampon was wrapped but once you open them, you'll see that the tampon is loose from the applicator. This never is the case when you buy them from the store. Most of mine were not usable for this reason which is really upsetting when you need them. Wherever these are coming from, they must be from the defective shelf. This is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! All pushed out!
customer_reviews.text: I “subscribe and save” to these. I just opened the box and the tampons are all pushed out! Completely unusable! I’m so mad! There is nothing I can do here now. What a waste. These are my go-to tampons, but unfortunately I will not be buying them from here anymore. I’ve cancelled my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: No Absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these at all!!! I’ve never thought I’d review tampons but I thought I’d share this cause I would want someone to give me a heads up. The packaging sucks cause the look absolutely the same besides the “r” and “s” I guess I’m just use to the green and yellow. The worst part was the absorbency...there wasn’t any!! I leaked through so many times I gave up on them. I figured since it was sports focus I would have better protection and that was a major NO!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Playtex is great, always have been
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Playtex since I was old enough to need to use them. They are comfortable, they work well and the applicator is comfortable. This is also a great buy! I bought two boxes so I don't expect to need to buy more for a few months! So much smarter than buying 18 in the super market every three weeks! Do yourself a favor and buy them here :) and I believe there was even an option to subscribe!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Drage

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good price, and listed ingredients on package
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, well priced, and I love that they list the ingredients on the packaging unlike most top brands! And the best part is, you don’t have to spend double the price for “organic tampons” to get the ingredients listed. My only issue is they aren’t great for heavy days. You’ll have to change them a lot but on my birth control I have irregular and usually very light periods. These are very clean made and work well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how you want them!!
customer_reviews.text: These tampons are so nice, very absorbent, and surprisingly comfortable. They are packed exactly how you would get them in the store and i have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Braun

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to insert and leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the plastic applicator. It often catches the string and pulls it back out. Although it expands when inside, it’s so short that it causes leakage! Also, it’s painful upon removal.
customer_reviews.author: Expert online shopper!

customer_reviews.title: Good tampons, but hate the wrapper
customer_reviews.text: The tampons are great, no issues with leaking or discomfort or anything. Love having this big ol' box...can never have too many. The only issue is the wrapper. Love that it is a quiet material, making it very discreet. But when you open them (there are little tabs) they don't open up enough or very easily, so it makes it difficult to get the tampon applicator back in. I've also dropped a couple on the floor opening up the wrapper. For the price, I would probably order again, but the wrapper is pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: KKuhn

customer_reviews.title: They are tampons
customer_reviews.text: What more do you want me to say? I wanna climb mountains, ride bikes, and look as happy as women in commercials without cramps....well, they don’t do all that, but they do absorb the blood before your panties are ruined and you have blood running down your leg...thank God and the man that invented these, because life probably extra sucked pre-tampons!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not for experienced user
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked these are so terrible because of the brand. Packaging: no "easy" open tab or perforated line on the wrapper. Absorbance-- I'm using super and it's not working at all. It's not expanding. Doesn't protect from clots. Plastic applicator is good, but that's it. Maybe this works for petite teenagers, but not adult women-- in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer in TN

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this one. Better then Tampax
customer_reviews.text: I like these more then tampax. The tampax I would get some leakage but the shape of these don't really allow that to happen. So if your comparing and going back and forth on which brand to get or which ones better I reccomened this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the ladies- subscribe and save it!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves these tampons. So much so, that I am now the proud owner of a monthly box through my subscribe and save. Women- buy. Men- take notes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: My tampons came in a box that was ripped open, clearly by someone trying to get inside it, with 4 super absorbency tampons missing. Pretty disappointing. Hope to get this rectified.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bailey

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE ALL OPENED- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: First off, I've purchased these Playtex Sport Tampons in the past from Target and other places and have never had any issues. BUT the ones I bought here were almost all opened, I think I found like one out of the fifty that was normal. I could feel the tampon out of the package in almost ever single one. Completely a waste. I ordered them as backups and did not think to check this when I first got the package because this had never happened to me so I can't even return them. I will definitely not repurchase these and DO NOT RECOMMEND. I am very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Its good for a bundle every tampon was there and the box wasn't damaged. The tampon itself could use a leak guard for sure. Something that have happened a few time is that the applicator to insert the tampon comes apart. Other then that its perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: He who must not be named

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy these again. They leak worse than any tampon I have ever tried. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Burks

customer_reviews.title: what the...
customer_reviews.text: Almost products of one box, especially regular size tampons are defective. The cotton is outside of the applicator so they are unusable. I got 3 boxes 3 months ago, but i noticed that today. Because no one check every single tampons when they get it. I want to get refund or replacements... This sucks made me so mad. I won't buy the tampon from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: My go-to brand, love the 50 ct box
customer_reviews.text: Good savings on this pack and I love the 50 count box. I hate using the plastic applicators and then throwing them away but the cardboard applicator tampons are usually subpar at leakage control so after a few trials with much error, I'm back to this tried and true brand.
customer_reviews.author: KLBRN

customer_reviews.title: Leak on heavy flow
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable to use and easy to change. But on my heaviest flow day - usually the first and second day, even with the "super" ones, it still leaks. Luckily I was prepared or it would be ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Shui

customer_reviews.title: Not for older women
customer_reviews.text: This tampon cut into my skin because the tips were so sharp.......would not suggest if you are older
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hastings

customer_reviews.title: They do their job well!
customer_reviews.text: Just switched from Tampax to these and I like these a little better. I have used tampax for years and decided to try these because they were cheaper. I’m not disappointed. Easy to use. They do their job well!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be getting this EVERY month!!
customer_reviews.text: I typically purchase this product (usually a 36 count box) from the drugstore every month. The price for a 50 count that was delivered directly to my front door the very next day was SO worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: ... keeps ordering these so I assume they are of good quality I personally have not tried them
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend keeps ordering these so I assume they are of good quality I personally have not tried them, do these come with instructions? is there some sort of specifications? I don't know
customer_reviews.author: Randall Crane

customer_reviews.title: I am not American but poor at English
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I am not American but poor at English. I hope you understand. I I live in Korea and unfortunately I can not get a playtex tampon here. So I bought it even though it is expensive (shipping charge 15usd) purchased it on April 6 and arrived on April 12 on the Korean date. It's so comfortable and nice! I think I'll keep using this product!
customer_reviews.author: OH SOYEON

customer_reviews.title: Do the intended job
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and absorb well. I especially like that there are super and regular in the same package and that I can subscribe and save so I don't have to worry about running out.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: I could feel it pulling apart
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price, that's all. Everytime it was time to pull it out it felt like the cotton was gonna stay inside me. I was changing just about every hour and it leaked , but the tampon was not even 1/4 full.
customer_reviews.author: KarNav

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Playtex Brand
customer_reviews.text: These were clearly not Playtex brand when they arrived. Logo and packaging were not the same and they looked different. I did not use this product because I felt unsure of its quality.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Worst tampons ever
customer_reviews.text: These are TERRIBLE. I’ve used several brands over my life & these are hands down the worst. Unless you want to feel like there’s a stick in your business, these are a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great for purse or diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the purse or diaper bag as they are the longer style vs the small/compact ones I normally like to have for when out and about. The are easy to use and the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Man can you run in these things
customer_reviews.text: Insert and forget until your time is up for the next! Comfortable and you can forget about feeling them inside! It’s like magic! Poof! No leaks. No mess, no bloody fingers when trying to change into the next bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best Tampons for working out
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these tampons because they are so comfortable and actually stay in place even in a really tough workout.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sigg

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I have used. I consistently buy in bulk or every couple months for the past two years. No box has ever came damaged. I love the variety and amount. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heyley

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and I do like them but they tend to leak with me and I'm a small girl who only had one child
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: not worth it if you want protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boxes of regular/super tampons and both my daughter and I and everyone of them leaked. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: anne marie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and always active and I don't get any other type of tampon. Easy to use and I don't feel it all day like I have in the past some others.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Big box of tamps
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention when I ordered but this is the biggest box of tampons I've ever gotten, very clutch. Price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: kg

customer_reviews.title: Terrible absorption
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. I’m pretty sure I leaked more using these than not. Stick with a diff brand I didn’t realize how bad these are. They absorb nothing
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.text: sometimes weren't comfortable after insertion, and the applicator fell apart sometimes when opening the package
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Garrie

customer_reviews.title: Playtex- False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The Super/Regular sizes are not a good combination for the target market of this brand. The vibrant colors attract young women, however the Super is too large. The standard combination advertised by Playtex should include light/regular given it’s popularity/availability. Please market more comfortable options at fair prices so inexperienced buyers will know that discomfort is a result of the wrong size, and not normal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like Playtex over all other brands and can’t beat Amazons price. I like that there’s two different absorbencies. That’s convenient
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’d open the tampon plastic to get it out and sometimes it’d break..... & also wouldn’t click that it was ready to insert. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to recommend
customer_reviews.text: They're not my favorite but I prefer them over most. Sometimes this brand I do find it to be a bit uncomfortable and absorbency it's as great as I'd like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Jones

customer_reviews.title: Still great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great Comfort! However the material of the actual tampons seemed to changed compare to the normal package.
customer_reviews.author: purplerose

customer_reviews.title: #1 for sure
customer_reviews.text: These are the only ones I will ever buy. They are way better and very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Strang

customer_reviews.title: Tampons
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampns They actually fit to your body I would definitely recommend these for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Miki hues

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Regular tampons came opened already. The tampon was out of the applicator. All unusable. The super ones were okay though
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to insert. Hate cardboard tampons and this is plastic so glides well. Good absorbent and flexible with working out. Only tampons I buy!
customer_reviews.author: Massaging Jen

customer_reviews.title: No leaking and absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only kind I use. No leaking and super absorbent and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jwllmsn

customer_reviews.title: NOT what is pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the packaging for this product AT ALL!!!!! Not sure how "old" dated this is but it's going back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Amazon subscribe and save has saved my life!
customer_reviews.text: This is our usual family product. The price for a 50 ct for a combo pack is great! The subscribe and save is wonderful for me as I am permanently disabled and can no longer drive. Thank you Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Dee Neisse

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These don't work well for me. They leak and don't absorbe properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kofta

customer_reviews.title: Leaks too much
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the time and money and look elsewhere. These are genuinely really bad at absorbing. The leaking is horrible and probably the worst that I have ever experienced. I ended up throwing these away and purchasing other ones. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I don’t play sports but if I did I would be good to go. Definitely prefer the unscented ones! Find that these hold and insure no leakage. Especially for heavier flows
customer_reviews.author: wendy ortega

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I've used playtex tampons for years and wouldn't use anything else. They make the best applicators of all the brands in my opinion. What else can you really say about a tampon?
customer_reviews.author: audie517

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Love this brand and company. Super easy to use for beginners or anyone really
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Defective tampons
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the tampons in this box are defective, the cotton is totally out of the plastic. I will not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Ohdyll

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I could have gotten a defective batch but so far all the ones I've used in this particular box seem to fall apart once inside . I've never used this brand before so not sure that this is normal as this brand has great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Atempt

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: About 30% of all the tampons were deconstructed before I even opened them. You could feel it in pieces through the wrapper. Would easily fall apart and were overall just a big pain, will not be purchasing again,
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Work just fine same as the store which is out due to hoarders
customer_reviews.author: local

customer_reviews.title: For light bleeders
customer_reviews.text: The super is like a regular. The regular is for someone barely spotting.
customer_reviews.author: Larene

customer_reviews.title: Out of applicator and in-usable
customer_reviews.text: Two-thirds of the regular tampons were out of their applicator and only usable like a non-applicator tampon. I prefer an applicator. Wasted about $3 worth of them.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This tampon is comfortable for active person :) also great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jisun

customer_reviews.title: 😕
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but , some times the product is damaged
customer_reviews.author: Tmcbroom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, feels like it's not even that time of month!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite tampons! Have used them for years and never leaked! This is also a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Keith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and do not want to cheat on it. This product really meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: The only tampons I’ll use. They never leak, never uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best tampons
customer_reviews.text: The only tampons I buy. I have a heavy flow and these are easy to insert, comfortable to wear and have great absorbancy.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: Tampons made me Cramp
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the tampon for an hour or longer, I noticed that I started feeling cramping. This concerned me so I don’t know if I want to use these anymore... too bad I purchased the 50-pack .
customer_reviews.author: Mishael

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It’s not worth the money. I’ve never had a box of tampons with so many open and unusable. Several had big slits in them causing the tampon to fall through the opening. The few that I was able to use were comfortable so no complaint there.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought I really liked these, but I think I'll go back to ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I really liked these, but I think I'll go back to Tampax Pearl as I think they are superior leak wise, and I don't like the string on these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: All regular sized tampons were out of the applicator. Totally unsanitary. I just opened my box and wish I would’ve realized that sooner. Now I can’t even get my money back for the defective items.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for years, I would highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Playtex customer for life
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best brand. Always a bad experience when I have to bum a tampon from a friend/coworker that's a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work like they should. No leaks and I love the eaay to grip applicators
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: These are all I use. They just work best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli J.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s a good tampon.. it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbency
customer_reviews.text: It never leaks for me and I feel almost nothing when using them. This is probably my favorite brand of tampons.
customer_reviews.author: Ken L

customer_reviews.title: Top choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these tampons for over 10 years. They’re the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏼 Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m thankful for subscribing and not having to think about it. It just comes to me.
customer_reviews.author: Shimmy

customer_reviews.title: Poor absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst tampons I have ever used. They are the complete opposite of what they are marketed and leak easily with little absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! packaging is cheap applicators comes apart every time you open. Doesn’t absorb anything. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Devan Borgen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Absorbent. Does the job it's supposed to do. Easy to use. No defective ones in my package.
customer_reviews.author: A. Drewes ❤ Product Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: These tampons are the only kind that fit just right. Love them, couldn’t recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Leaked three times today
customer_reviews.text: This is the messiest period I’ve every endured. The plastic applicators come apart easily in your pocket. They are not comfortable I was reminded every second it was there. I never thought I would leave a review for sanitary products I thought they all worked the same lol I am never leaving my brand again
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They're tampons... they do what they're intended to do lol
customer_reviews.author: Cassie B.

customer_reviews.title: Playtex Sport Tampons with Flex-Fit Technology
customer_reviews.text: A great price for the ladies of the house. Order under the rules of subscribe and save and you have an excellent price. .You can't go wrong when it meets your household standards
customer_reviews.author: mydollarbill

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My go to great price and like the multi pack!

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible not great
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price. Seems like every 4th one falls apart before you get a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: mommysam

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! My coworker recommended buying tampons in bulk on Amazon which I first thought was silly, but in the long run it saves you some money!!!! Good idea!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyLandRover

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. Packaging is a joke and a waste and the bottom comes apart from the top when you try to open. Not to mention the shape. Doesn’t absorb at all.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the would absorb a bit more but besides that they work amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena M

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time this has happened
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised to see that other buyers had the same issues of all the tampons being "ejected" from the plastic. Very disappointing because the previous order I made was like this and now the most currnent box order was mangled like someone stepped on it. The box was open as seen in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Better deal than in stores. More tampons for cheaper and they're comfortable which was very important for me
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Choice brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved this brand. Super affordable and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Buckwheat91

product_meta.title: Playtex Sport Tampons with Flex-Fit Technology, Regular & Super Multi Pack, Unscented - 50Count
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteSport unscented regular and super multipack 50 count. Gives prote count ion for bodies in motion and neutralizes undesirable odors without affect counting fragrance. Sport unscented regular and super multipack 50 count. Has contoured applicator for comfortable, precise placement with flex fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Sport unscented regular and super multipack 50 count. Provides 360-degree prote count ion for ultimate comfort.
feature_bullets: Neutralizes Undesirable Odors Without Affecting Fragrance
Contoured applicator for comfortable, precise placement
Flex fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks
